main.io_utilities.read_raw_data(main_directory_path)[source]

main.io_utilities.read_txt_file(file_path)[source]

Return the content from the file from the given path.

Parameters:

file_path – path to the target file

Returns:

a dictionary with 2 entries: title and content of the file

Return type:

built-in python dictionary
